judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgments of sentence reversed and a new trial awarded. Commonwealth v. Contakos, 455 Pa. 136, 314 A.2d 259 (1974).
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Abraham T. Needleman, Dennis H. Eisman, Joel D. Coney, Gerald A. Stein, and Needleman, Needleman, Tabb é Eisman, Ltd., for appellant.
Benjamin II. Levintow and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, Bichard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Williams, Appellant.
Submitted November 8, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Abraham T. Needleman, Dennis H. Eisman, Joel D. Coney, Gerald A. Stein, and Needleman, Needleman, Tabb é Eisman, Ltd., for appellant.

March 25, 1974:
